template:
[Unit]
Description=discoveryService
After=network.target

[Service]
ExecStart=/usr/bin/node /root/discoveryService/server.js
Environment=CI=true
Restart=always
StandardOutput=inherit
StandardError=inherit
WorkingDirectory=/root/discoveryService

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target

command: systemctl daemon-reload && systemctl enable discoveryService && systemctl start discoveryService
name: start discovery
autoSearch

msg.payload = "sudo -u postgres -H -- psql -d postgres -t -A -c 'select count(*) from public.\"USERS\";'";
return msg;

msg.payload = "sudo -u postgres -H -- psql -d postgres -t -A -c 'select a.\"SCORE\", b.\"AGE\", b.\"GENDER\", b.\"MONTHLY_PAYMENT\" from (select \"SCORE\" from \"SENTIMENT\" order by \"ETIME\" DESC LIMIT 1) a left join \"USERS\" b on 1=1;'";

return msg;
